author: thorsten
msg: Implementing the generation of the return document

author: ate
msg: - implemented new default AuthenticationProvider and JAAS DefaultLoginModule logic
- improve the SecurityValveImpl which will try to actually access the previously loaded UserSubjectPrincipal in the DefaulLoginModule within the JAAS container (Tomcat only for now).

author: clement
msg: Changes the 'interface' attribute of the service dependency handler to be 'specification'. This change remove a differentiation between service dependencies description. The 'interface' attribute stills supported but becomes deprecated.
The Core XML-Schema is modified according to this change.
